CustomField.description: Enhanced via RO-1295. Shows email domain only if it is not a private service
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( CONTAINS(Email, "hotmail"), CONTAINS(Email, "gmx"), CONTAINS(Email, "heyjobs"), CONTAINS(Email, "hj.de"), CONTAINS(Email, "aol.de"), CONTAINS(Email, "aol.com"), CONTAINS(Email, "arcor.de"), CONTAINS(Email, "freenet.de"), CONTAINS(Email, "gmail.com"), CONTAINS(Email, "googlemail.com"), CONTAINS(Email, "outlook"), CONTAINS(Email, "yahoo"), CONTAINS(Email, "icloud.com"), CONTAINS(Email, "inbox.lv"), CASE(SUBSTITUTE(Email, LEFT(Email, FIND("@", Email)), NULL), "t-online.de", "true", "web.de", "true", "mail.de", "true", "mail.com", "true", "live.de", "true", "live.com", "true", "test.de", "true", "false") = "true" ),
null, SUBSTITUTE(Email, LEFT(Email, FIND("@", Email)), NULL) )
CustomField.label: Email Domain
